summary: The VA plans to replace the Veterans Choice Program in June 2019 with the Veterans Community Care Program. The Veterans Choice Program allowed eligible veterans to obtain health care services from providers not directly employed by VA (community providers). We testified on challenges and lessons learned from the Veterans Choice Program that could help VA successfully implement its new program. These challenges include: Complex referral...
title: Veterans Health Care: VA Needs to Address Challenges as It Implements the Veterans Community Care Program
